message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $120. I think you'll really love it!

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested, but $120 is a bit higher than I was hoping to spend.  Would you be willing to come down to $100? I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob! I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110. What do you think?
